DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the impact of high- and low-intensity resistance exercise on force-velocity characteristics, muscle mass and inflammatory processes in older adults. As all training protocols are designed to end with maximal effort, effects are expected to be similar between groups.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Low- and High-intensity Resistance Exercise on Force-velocity Characteristics in Older Adults
DOC.criteria: age 60 to 80 years Knee or hip prothesis Systematic training Cardiovascular disease Acute lower back pain Dementia
